title: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor
summary: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor (same donor as pbmc4k). PBMCs are primary cells with relatively small amounts of RNA (~1pg RNA/cell). Used Chromium v2 chemistry and Cell Ranger 1.3.0 software.  8403 cells were detected.
